dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- IRC
dmca.body:
International Rescue Committee
192 East 42nd Street
New York, NY 10168-1209
Tel 212.561.3000
Fax 212.551.0179
www.theIRC.org

February 14, 2007

Google, Inc.
Attn: Blogger Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy
Mountain View, CA 94043

To Whom It May Concern:

The International Rescue Committee (IRC) wishes to file a notice of infringement regarding misappropriation of IRC content by Orden Bonaria on its blog (http://bonaria-humanitaria.blogspot.com), hosted by Blogger. IRC is an international humanitarian aid organization, headquartered in New York, with 501(c)(3) status. The material identified below appeared on IRC blogs on IRC's website. The materials were authored by IRC employees and describe IRC programs. We appreciate your efforts to stop this misappropriation and misrepresentation of IRC's works. IRC reserves the right to pursue any and all legal remedies directly against Orden Banaria for the unlawful use of IRC's materials.

The following is the supporting information required by support@blogger.com, dated February 9, 2007 (attached):

1-2. IRC copyrighted work that has been infringed upon and infringing material.

a. IRC content: http://ircblog.org/archives/1930_1321467639/205457 - blog post by IRC communications officer Emily Holland

Infringing content: http://bonaria-humanitaria.blogspot.com/2007/01/bonarialive-health-clinin-in-otash.html - attributed to Orden Bonaria and "Sor+ Emily Dundee O.B+GM"

b. IRC content: http://ircblog.org/archives/1930_1321467639/208120 - blog post by IRC emergency communications coordinator Melissa Winkler

Infringing content: http://bonaria-humanitaria.blogspot.com/2007/02/priority-of-chad.html

c. IRC content: http://ircblog.org/archives/1930_1321467639/207659 - blog post by Melissa Winkler

Infringing content: http://bonaria-humanitaria.blogspot.com/2007/02/priority-of-chad-schools.html

d. IRC content: http://ircblog.org/archives/1930_1321467639/206964

Infringing content: http://bonaria-humanitaria.blogspot.com/2007/02/darfur-abu-shok-camp.html text and photo

e. IRC content: http://www.theirc.org/news/trapped-in-the-desert-by-a.html - OpEd first published in the International Herald Tribune by IRC senior policy adviser Anna Husarska

Infringing content: http://bonaria-humanitaria.blogspot.com/2007/01/bonarialive-shimelba-refugee-camp.html - text, photo and map

f. IRC content: http://ircblog.org/archives/1930_1321467639/205627 (photo) and http://ircblog.org/archives/1930_1321467639/205458 (text)

Infringing content: http://bonaria-humanitaria.blogspot.com/2007/01/women-health-center.html

g. IRC content: http://ircblog.org/archives/1930_1321467639/206957

Infringing content: http://bonaria-humanitaria.blogspot.com/2007/01/no-la-presidencia-de-sudan-en-la-unin.html - photograph taken out of context (text is not the IRC's)

h. IRC content: http://www.theirc.org/news/irc-says-iraqi-refugees.html

Infringing content: http://bonaria-humanitaria.blogspot.com/2007/01/bonarialive-front-us-othernations.html - text and photo

i. IRC content: Text and photo taken from:
http://www.theirc.org/news/page.jsp?itemID=31507516 (text and photo);
http://www.theirc.org/where/the_irc_in_uganda.html (drawing)

Infringing content: http://bonaria-humanitaria.blogspot.com/2007/02/uganda-mendoza-project.html

3. Contact Information

Carrie A. Simon, General Counsel
International Rescue Committee
122 East 42nd Street
New York, NY 10168
Ph. 212 551 2729
Carrie.Simon@theirc.org

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyirghted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, International Rescue Committee, its agent, or the law.

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of IRC, the owner of an exclusive right that has been infringed.

Sincerely,

Carrie A. Simon
General Counsel

Cc: Kathleen Sands, Web Director
